post:
##You are looking for a test environment for your development - or want to provide a productive system for your customers? 

##Then we KTS24.com are your contact!

We offer you the right substructure at the best price.
++ No hidden costs, full transparency, high availability ++

Use the possibility to scale your service as you like.

On our website https://kts24.com you will find our entire portfolio but I would like to introduce three products:

All offerings are protected against downtime by Voxility DDoS Protection and are located in our colocation in the Netherlands.
We offer Looking Glass to test the connection: https://lg.nl.haendler.it/


##RYZEN NVME - 2 GB for only 4,99 € per month
* 1 shared Ryzen 3900X cores
* 2 GB of memory
* 15 GB NVMe storage
* Public IPv4 address

##SSD G2 - 4 GB for 4.99 € per month
* 2 shared Intel E5 Cores
* 4 GB RAM
* 60 GB SSD storage
* Public IPv4 address

##SAS HDD - 4 GB for 4.99 € per month
* 2 shared Intel E5 Core
* 4 GB RAM
* 60 GB SAS storage
* Public IPv4 address

All systems are powered by two independent circuits and are redundantly connected to our network to ensure the best possible stability of your systems.

For more information about the data center, please visit: https://kts24.com/about/datacenter
